data.lyric:
[ti:Blue World (Explicit)]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Blue World (Explicit) - Mac Miller
[00:00.19]Lyrics by：G. Forrest/G. Lawrence/M. McCormick/R. Wright
[00:00.39]It's a blue world without you
[00:14.84]It's a blue world alone
[00:36.06]Yeah well this mad world made me crazy
[00:39.20]Might just turn around do one-eighty
[00:42.04]I ain't politickin' I ain't kissin' no babies
[00:44.85]The devil on my doorstep bein' so shady
[00:47.71]Mmm don't trip
[00:49.16]We don't gotta let him in don't trip
[00:53.03]Yeah yeah
[00:55.00]I let it go but I never go with it
[00:57.83]Uh yeah
[00:59.28]Okay cool as fall weather
[01:01.17]F**k the bulls**t I'm here to make it all better
[01:03.53]With a little music for you
[01:06.08]I don't do enough for you
[01:07.83]Without you it's the color blue
[01:10.02]Ooh don't trip
[01:11.67]I was in the city they was talkin' that s**t
[01:14.42]Had the homies with me all a sudden they split
[01:17.36]We ain't even worried we just laughin' that's rich
[01:20.25]You know how it goes it ain't broke don't fix
[01:22.92]Hey one of these days we'll all get by
[01:29.81]Don't be afraid don't fall
[01:32.54]Think I lost my mind reality's so hard to find
[01:36.02]When the devil tryna call your line but s**t I always shine
[01:39.93]Even when the light dim
[01:41.58]No I ain't God but I'm feelin' just like Him
[01:44.18]Ooh don't trip
[01:45.36]See I was in the whip ridin' me and my b***h
[01:48.07]We was listenin' to us no one else that's it
[01:50.82]That's a flex just a bit let me talk my s**t
[01:53.62]Say my hand got bit
[01:55.08]Yeah well this mad world made me crazy
[01:58.32]Might just turn around do one-eighty
[02:01.14]I ain't politickin' I ain't kissin' no babies
[02:03.76]The devil on my doorstep bein' so shady
[02:06.71]Mmm don't trip
[02:08.10]We don't gotta let him in don't trip
[02:12.02]Yeah yeah
[02:14.03]I let it go but I never go with it
[02:16.93]Uh
[02:21.16]Don't trip
[02:24.07]Don't trip
[02:27.03]Don't trip
[02:29.26]Well if you could see me now
[02:32.86]Lovin' and holdin' it down
[02:35.76]My mind it goes it goes
[02:38.88]It goes it goes it goes
[02:40.98]Well this mad world made me crazy
[02:43.69]Might just turn around do one-eighty
[02:46.31]I ain't politickin' I ain't kissin' no babies
[02:48.90]The devil on my doorstep bein' so shady
[02:51.86]Mmm don't trip
[02:53.32]We don't gotta let him in don't trip
[02:57.19]Yeah yeah
[02:59.23]I let it go but I never go with it
[03:02.08]Uh
[03:15.88]Hey one of these days we'll all get by
[03:22.85]Don't be afraid don't fall in line
data.trans:
[ti:Blue World (Explicit)]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.19]//
[00:00.39]没有你的世界陷入一片忧郁
[00:14.84]孑然一身 我郁郁寡欢
[00:36.06]好吧 这喧嚣的世界让我抓狂
[00:39.20]也许我该试着转变视角
[00:42.04]我没有参加政治竞选 我不会假意亲吻孩子
[00:44.85]门外的恶魔鬼鬼祟祟
[00:47.71]小心一些
[00:49.16]我们不会让他进来 小心一些
[00:53.03]//
[00:55.00]我慢慢放手 可我不会随波逐流
[00:57.83]//
[00:59.28]好吧 冷静下来 犹如凉爽的秋日
[01:01.17]流言蜚语 置之不理 我会让一切好转
[01:03.53]为你播放一点音乐
[01:06.08]我为你做的还远远不够
[01:07.83]没有你 我郁郁寡欢
[01:10.02]小心一些
[01:11.67]我在城里 他们喋喋不休
[01:14.42]与我情同手足的朋友 他们突然离我而去
[01:17.36]我们不必担心 只要我们放声大笑就此生无憾
[01:20.25]你知道来龙去脉 我还能坚持 不需要安慰
[01:22.92]我们会熬过这些艰难的日子
[01:29.81]不要害怕 不要沉沦
[01:32.54]我想我失去理智 现实难以找寻
[01:36.02]当心魔试图呼唤你时 可我总是容光焕发
[01:39.93]即使灯光昏暗
[01:41.58]尽管我不是上帝 可我感觉我很像他
[01:44.18]小心一些
[01:45.36]你瞧 我驾车驰骋 爱人作陪
[01:48.07]我们听着彼此的歌 再无其他
[01:50.82]这是一种炫耀 让我把话说完
[01:53.62]我说有人会错意
[01:55.08]好吧 这喧嚣的世界让我抓狂
[01:58.32]也许我该试着转变视角
[02:01.14]我没有参加政治竞选 我不会假意亲吻孩子
[02:03.76]门外的恶魔鬼鬼祟祟
[02:06.71]小心一些
[02:08.10]我们不会让他进来 小心一些
[02:12.02]//
[02:14.03]我慢慢放手 可我不会随波逐流
[02:16.93]//
[02:21.16]小心一些
[02:24.07]小心一些
[02:27.03]小心一些
[02:29.26]如果你现在可以看见我
[02:32.86]用爱将我
[02:35.76]我的思绪愈发混乱
[02:38.88]胡思乱想
[02:40.98]好吧 这喧嚣的世界让我抓狂
[02:43.69]也许我该试着转变视角
[02:46.31]我没有参加政治竞选 我不会假意亲吻孩子
[02:48.90]门外的恶魔鬼鬼祟祟
[02:51.86]小心一些
[02:53.32]我们不会让他进来 小心一些
[02:57.19]//
[02:59.23]我慢慢放手 可我不会随波逐流
[03:02.08]//
[03:15.88]我们会熬过这些艰难的日子
[03:22.85]不要害怕 不要泯为众人
